headline: Mama’s Creations Acquires Fresh Protein Manufacturer Crown I Enterprises
summary: Strategic Acquisition from Sysco to Expand Customer Base and Production Capabilities; Crown I Generated $56M in Profitable Revenue in FY25 at Marquee Retailer Partners $17.5 Million All-Cash Acquisition, at Attractive 0.3x FY25 Revenue Multiple, to be Fully Financed by Private Placement with Institutional Investors and Long-Term Credit Facility with M&T Bank EAST RUTHERFORD, NJ, Sept. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mama’s Creations, Inc. (Nasdaq: MAMA) (the “Company” or “Mama”), a leading national
